item.description:
Join us on April 28th for another lovely Blues Cafe.

Dance all night to swing and blues music, DJed by Gina Helfrich and John Joven(NY), and refresh yourself with some bacon-themed snacks (we'll have veggie options too : )!

We'll also have a blues performance from Chris Mayer & Amanda Gruhl.

Have friends who've never danced swing or blues before? Our free beginner lesson is 8-9pm. No partner or experience necessary!

Beginner lesson: 8-9pm
Social dancing: 9pm-12:30am

Students: $12
E'rybody else: $15
Coffee, tea, water, snacks, & lesson are included in the price of admission. Enjoy!

http://www.bluescafeboston.com/

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: April Blues Cafe - Swing, Bacon, & Blues
